column3: {\hskip0.04in\bfseries †\hskip0.04in} et nomen sanctum tuum invocátum est super nos; ne derelínquas nos
column8: and thy name is called upon by us: forsake us not

column1: {\footnotesize ℟.} \hskip0.05in Deo grátias. ^ Thanks be to God.

column5: as the apple of thine eye.

column1: {\footnotesize ℟.} \hskip0.05in Sub umbra alárum tuárum prótege nos. ^ Protect us under the shadow of thy wings.
